history.proof: intros d sigma H. unfold DTA_kill_empty_states. destruct d. hauto lq: on depth: 3use: DTA_kill_correct_wrt_sign_invar.

exceptions.exn: In environment p : preDTA a : ad sigma : signature H : dta_correct_wrt_sign (dta p a) sigma Unable to unify "match DTA_kill ?M1855 ?M1854 with | dta d _ => predta_correct_wrt_sign d ?M1856 end" with "match match MapGet state (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states p) p) a with | Some _ => dta (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states p) p) a | None => dta (M1 state 0%N (M0 prec_list)) 0%N end with | dta d _ => predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma end".

In environment p : preDTA a : ad sigma : signature H : dta_correct_wrt_sign (dta p a) sigma Unable to unify "dta_correct_wrt_sign (dta p a) sigma" with "dta_correct_wrt_sign match MapGet state (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states p) p) a with | Some _ => dta (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states p) p) a | None => dta (M1 state 0%N (M0 prec_list)) 0%N end sigma".

original: intros d sigma H. unfold DTA_kill_empty_states. destruct d. simpl. apply DTA_kill_correct_wrt_sign_invar. apply H.
